title: Elvira, or, The worst not always true a comedy / written by a person of quality.
author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.
publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Brome,
notes: Published anonymously, without dedication or preface.
Written by Lord Digby. cf. Nicoll, A. A hist. of Eng. drama, 1660-1900, 1961: v. 1, p. 402-3.
Reproduction of originals in the Newberry Library and the Huntington Library.
